captions.text:
You say one thing than the other
You don't think at all

It's all empty
and you are fake, Crying

There was probably no love
from the start, please regret

This and that, the me that
you treated with your nerve is not here

Now I understand
This freaking love's done

I called you every night baby
 to say good night maybe

If I had a sin
It's that I was innocent

My fire was dying and it 
was flying towards you

You know you
gotta apologize

You made me a
devil at last

You know you
gotta apologize

Please be trapped among
the wrinkles of my brain and suffocate

You don't have to say much
Just think about what you've done

If you begged for mercy
I might have thought about it

But there's no possiblity since
you are the devil woman That's you

I called you every night baby
to say good night maybe

If I had a sin
It's that I was innocent

Now I'm all ready
A sorry with true feelings
I know it's time to hear it
You know you gotta apologize

You made me a
devil at last
You know you gotta apologize

Please burn in
my despise

That great smile turned
to contempt of a wicked woman

I saw your truth side that
was hidden and not shown

You know you
 gotta apologize
You took me easy

You know you
 gotta apologize

You made me a
devil at last

You know you
 gotta apologize

Please be trapped among
the wrinkles of my brain and suffocate
This is my last request

Please don't make
me a devil

comments.text:
In my opinion, I prefer when Korean singers(male) have the love interest in 
their video also Korean. Not just because this artist isn't that popular, I 
think Big Bang should of done the same thing with 'Blue' too. Don't give 
the western world anymore credit then they deserve. Use Koreans and push 
the Korean music industry brand to a height where it can stand on it's own 
two feed without direction and/or appreciation from the U.S. 

The song is really nice, though. Nicely composed and arranged. Would love 
to purchase on iTunes, if available. ﻿
